text.description: The text of the release notes.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1ReleaseNotes.description: Notes that belong to a release.

testerCount.description: Count of testers added to the release

distributedAt.description: Timestamp when the release was created

testerWithInstallCount.description: Number of testers who have installed the release

openInvitationCount.description: Number of testers who have open invitations for the release

firebaseConsoleUri.description: Output only. A link to the Firebase console displaying a single release.

testingUri.description: Output only. A link to the release in the tester web clip or Android app that lets testers (which were granted access to the app) view release notes and install the app onto their devices.

binaryDownloadUri.description: Output only. A signed link (which expires in one hour) to directly download the app binary (IPA/APK/AAB) file.

displayVersion.description: Output only. Display version of the release. For an Android release, the display version is the `versionName`. For an iOS release, the display version is the `CFBundleShortVersionString`.

buildVersion.description: Output only. Build version of the release. For an Android release, the build version is the `versionCode`. For an iOS release, the build version is the `CFBundleVersion`.

name.description: The name of the release resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`

createTime.description: Output only. The time the release was created.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1Release.description: A release of a Firebase app.

release.description: The release that was created from the upload (only set on "SUCCESS")

message.description: Any additional context for the given upload status (e.g. error message) Meant to be displayed to the client

errorCode.description: The error code associated with (only set on "FAILURE")

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaLoginCrede.description: Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

passwordResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the password UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

usernameResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the username UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

contactEmail.description: Developer contact email for testers to reach out to about privacy or support issues.

projectNumber.description: Project number of the Firebase project, for example 300830567303.

aabCertificate.description: App bundle test certificate generated for the app.

aabState.description: App bundle state. Only valid for android apps. The app_view field in the request must be set to FULL in order for this to be populated.
enumDescriptions: Aab state unspecified
App can receive app bundle uploads
Firebase project is not linked to a Play developer account
There is no app in linked Play developer account with the same bundle id
The app in Play developer account is not in a published state
Play App status is unavailable
Play IAS terms not accepted

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the test was run.

loginCredential.description: Optional. Input only. Login credentials for the test. Input only.

name.description: The name of the release test resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}/tests/{test_id}`

deviceExecutions.description: Required. The results of the test on each device.

aiInstructions.description: Optional. Input only. Instructions for AI driven test. Input only.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaReleaseTes.description: The results of running an automated test on a release.

aiInstructions.description: Optional. Instructions for AI driven test

loginCredential.description: Optional. Login credential for automated tests

stackTrace.description: Output only. The raw stack trace.

message.description: Output only. The message associated with the crash.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAppCrash.description: An app crash that occurred during an automated test.

appDescription.description: Optional. Describes the app to give the AI some context

steps.description: Required. Steps to be accomplished by the AI

testerUdids.description: The UDIDs of tester iOS devices in a project

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGetTesterU.description: Response containing the UDIDs of tester iOS devices in a project

mainActivityCrawlTimedOut.description: Output only. Whether the main activity crawl timed out.

distinctVisitedScreens.description: Output only. Number of distinct screens visited.

actionsPerformed.description: Output only. Number of actions that crawler performed.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaRoboStats.description: Statistics collected during a Robo test.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTesterUdid.description: The UDIDs of a tester's iOS device

platform.description: The platform of the tester's device

udid.description: The UDID of the tester's device

name.description: The name of the tester's device

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaDeviceExec.description: The results of running an automated test on a particular device.

inconclusiveReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test was inconclusive.
enumDescriptions: Reason unspecified.
Not enough quota remained to run the test.
The outcome of the test could not be determined because of a failure in the test running infrastructure.
A required cloud service api is not activated (Google Cloud Testing API or Cloud Tool Results API).
The app was not signed.
A main launcher activity could not be found.
The app declares one or more permissions that are not allowed.
Device administrator applications are not allowed.
APK contains no code. See also https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/application-element.html#code
APK is built for a preview SDK which is unsupported.

roboStats.description: Output only. The statistics collected during the Robo test.

appCrash.description: Output only. An app crash, if any occurred during the test.

videoUri.description: Output only. A URI to a video of the test run.

screenshotUris.description: Output only. A list of screenshot image URIs taken from the Robo crawl. The file names are numbered by the order in which they were taken.

enumDescriptions: Reason unspecified.
The app crashed during the test.
If an app is not installed and thus no test can be run with the app. This might be caused by trying to run a test on an unsupported platform.
If the app could not be crawled (possibly because the app did not start).
If the device ran out of memory during the test.
failedReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test failed.

resultsStoragePath.description: Output only. The path to a directory in Cloud Storage that will eventually contain the results for this execution. For example, gs://bucket/Nexus5-18-en-portrait.

device.description: Required. The device that the test was run on.

state.description: Output only. The state of the test.
enumDescriptions: Test state unspecified.
The test is in progress.
The test has passed.
The test has failed.
The test was inconclusive.

crawlGraphUri.description: Output only. A URI to an image of the Robo crawl graph.

releaseNotes.description: The actual release notes body from the user

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAiInstruct.description: A step to be accomplished by the AI

goal.description: A goal to be accomplished by the AI

assertion.description: An assertion to be checked by the AI

google.description: Optional. Are these credentials for Google?

fieldHints.description: Optional. Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

name.description: Identifier. The name of the test configuration resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testConfig`

testDevices.description: Optional. Tests will be run on this list of devices

locale.description: Optional. The locale of the device (e.g. "en_US" for US English) during the test.

orientation.description: Optional. The orientation of the device during the test.

version.description: Required. The version of the device (API level on Android).

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTestDevice.description: A device on which automated tests can be run.

enumDescriptions: Upload binary result unspecified
Upload binary resulted in a new release
Upload binary updated an existing release
Upload binary resulted in a no-op. A release with the exact same binary already exists.

release.description: Release associated with the uploaded binary.

nextPageToken.description: A short-lived token, which can be sent as `pageToken` to retrieve the next page. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGetRelease.description: Response object to get the release given a upload hash

buildVersion.description: Optional. Ignored. Used to be build version of the app release if an instance identifier was provided for the release_id.

displayVersion.description: Optional. Ignored. Used to be display version of the app release if an instance identifier was provided for the release_id.

emails.description: Optional. An email address which should get access to this release, for example rebeccahe@google.com

groupIds.description: Optional. A repeated list of group aliases to enable access to a release for Note: This field is misnamed, but can't be changed because we need to maintain compatibility with old build tools

certificateHashMd5.description: MD5 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

certificateHashSha256.description: SHA256 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

certificateHashSha1.description: SHA1 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-pl.description: See, edit, configure, and delete your Google Cloud data and see the email address for your Google Account.

getUdids.description: Get UDIDs of tester iOS devices in a project

project.description: The name of the project, which is the parent of testers Format: `projects/{project_number}`

mobilesdkAppId.description: Unique id for a Firebase app of the format: {version}:{project_number}:{platform}:{hash(bundle_id)} Example: 1:581234567376:android:aa0a3c7b135e90289

name.description: Required. The name of the `TestConfig` resource to retrieve. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testConfig`
Identifier. The name of the test configuration resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testConfig`

updateMask.description: Optional. The list of fields to update.

list.description: List results for automated tests run on release.

parent.description: Required. The name of the release resource, which is the parent of the tests Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`

pageSize.description: Optional. The maximum number of tests to return. The service may return fewer than this value.

pageToken.description: Optional. A page token, received from a previous `ListReleaseTests` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

name.description: Required. The name of the release test resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}/tests/{test_id}`

get.description: Get results for automated test run on release.

releaseTestId.description: Optional. The ID to use for the test, which will become the final component of the tests's resource name. This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters are /a-z-/. If it is not provided one will be automatically generated.

parent.description: Required. The name of the release resource, which is the parent of the test Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`

mobilesdkAppId.description: Unique id for a Firebase app of the format: {version}:{project_number}:{platform}:{hash(bundle_id)} Example: 1:581234567376:android:aa0a3c7b135e90289

enumDescriptions: The default / unset value. The API will default to the BASIC view.
Include everything except aab_state.
Include everything.
appView.description: App view. When unset or set to BASIC, returns an App with everything set except for aab_state. When set to FULL, returns an App with aab_state set.

mobilesdkAppId.description: Unique id for a Firebase app of the format: {version}:{project_number}:{platform}:{hash(bundle_id)} Example: 1:581234567376:android:aa0a3c7b135e90289

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

enumDescriptions: v1 error format
v2 error format

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

enumDescriptions: Responses with Content-Type of application/json
Media download with context-dependent Content-Type
Responses with Content-Type of application/x-protobuf

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.
